You don't have to name names.. I remember!  Are they really demonic?  Do yo=
u know why they have to receive an invitation before they can enter?  I won=
't be so blas=E9 in the future.

Robin


  ----- Original Message -----

  Frank-S

aranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
  >
  > 
  > Robin,
  > 
  > It's never =
a good idea to invite any spirits into your home.
  > Some demonic spirits =
have to be invited in before they can 
  > enter, there are instinces where=
 people have heard knocks on thier
  > front door only to answer the door a=
nd have no one there.
  > The knocking by an entity and the opening by the =
physical being 
  > symbolises the request to come in and the invitation of=
 the open 
  door.
  > 
  > If you give out a ready made invitation, it cou=
ld be like that 
  annoying
  > relative that comes to visit and never leav=
es.
  > 
  > So be very careful whenever summoning any unknown entities.
  =
> 
  > If you need help with your box research or have any questions
  > do=
n't hesitate.
  > 
  > Bruce
  > Bruce Halliday 
  > 
  > 
  > To: EVP-ITC@=
...: MudPuddleFarm@...: Fri, 18 Jan 2008 10:49:53 -
  0800Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] this damned protection debate--Bruce
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  =
> Yes Bruce, "We want to kill you" is word for word what I hear. 
  Thank y=
ou for being the first person ever to validate this for me, 
  because now =
I know it's REAL, I'm not crazy, and it isn't my 
  imagination. This was c=
aptured on a digital voice recorder while I 
  was heating coffee in the mi=
crowave oven nearby, and I felt that the 
  microwave must have been a powe=
rful energy source for the "speaker." 
  It may be important to note that I=
 had just invited spirits inside 
  the house from outside, and that after =
I listened to this message I 
  told them to go back outside because they w=
ere too rude to continue 
  talking to. I've tried to replicate this experi=
ment a number of 
  times since then (without the verbal invitation into my=
 home) and 
  have had no luck whatsoever. 
  > 
  > Gleefully moving on to=
 box research!
  > 
  > Robin
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ---=
--

c%40yahoogroups.com>

  > 
  > 
  > Robin, =
In the evp file you posted I believe I'm hearing "we want to 
  kill you"pl=
ease let me know if that is what you hear. Robin, I am 
  glad to hear that=
 the protection ritual will be utilized by you in 
  the purpose it was int=
ended. To give any individual that wants to 
  anopportunity to use it. You=
 will find many forms of interaction on 
  this group, running the gamut fr=
om total agreement to calm 
  debate /discussion. To full blown arguments. =
That is what makes a 
  group, If everyone followed one single ideology and=
 the ideas of any 
  single person without questionit would not be a group =
it would be a 
  cult. Welcome to the wonderful world of box research robin=
, I'm sure 
  you will be a valued member and researcher in this community.=
 Bruce
  > Bruce Halliday 
  > 
  > 
  > To: EVP-ITC@...: MudPuddleFarm@...=
: Thu, 17 Jan 2008 22:38:57 -
  0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] this damned prot=
ection debate--Bruce
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > I'm still giving this topic a =
lot of thought because I absolutely 
  believe in the power of prayer, the =
power of positivity, and the 
  power of ritual. When I first started recor=
ding EVP a couple of 
  years ago I was warned to expect negative responses=
, so when it 
  happened to me I felt elated rather than frightened or dist=
ressed. I 
  will ask again: What physical or psychic harm is a disembodied=
 
  entity capable of doing? Please listen to the one EVP I've posted on 
 =
 this board and tell me what, if anything, you hear. I know what I 
  hear,=
 and I consider it distinctly threatening; yet, this is the 
  response tha=
t has created the determination in me to continue 
  researching the unknow=
n. 
  > 
  > Bruce, I am in awe of your recordings. I only want to learn as=
 
  much as I can from you and the other dedicated researchers on this 
  b=
oard. It never occurred to me to use a protection ritual in the 
  past, an=
d that's about all I can say. I will probably use one from 
  this point on=
, maybe not so much to repel evil as to attract 
  goodness. 
  > 
  > So, =
thank you for this contribution. I think the debate has been 
  an excellen=
t one, and I've appreciated the opportunity to be 
  enlightened.
  > 
  > =
Robin
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- 
  > From: bhali333 
=
  > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>

otection debate

  > I swore I would not get wraped up in this deb=
ateBUT!The reason I 
  came up with this whole protection ritual was that s=
ome of the new 
  researchers whereexpressing a rational concern for negati=
ve responces 
  that they were recieving through thier boxes.The short prot=
ection 
  ritual that I posted is not meant to quell irrational histerical =

  fear, and I agreewith rosemary that anyone suffering from such fear 
  s=
hould rethink thier involment in the paranormal research field.that 
  bein=
g said, It was only meant as a source of subliminal comfort to 
  those new=
 individuals that had never expperienced spiritual 
  negativity. And to he=
lp ease them into aproaching a session 
  eventually with confidenceand det=
ermination as well as full 
  curiousity for all types of the communication=
 we recieve.My initial 
  post of the ritual file was done with the best of=
 intentions and 
  meant to be another tool available for those who felt th=
ey needed or 
  wanted to employ it. it is a simple innocent prayer ritual,=
 I don't 
  think it is really worthy of all this debate.Use it, don't use =
it. 
  It's there if you want it. Also I must say there are two kinds of 
 =
 fear the kind that is natural and a god given emotion for self 
  preserva=
tion, ie the fright and flight reflex that is an instinctive 
  trait in al=
l of us. Then you have the irrational dibilitating phobic 
  fear that can =
turn an individual into a frozen statue. That type of 
  fear I believe is =
unhealthyand should be addressed and dealt with and 
  learned how to harne=
ss. I also believe that anyone that harbors that 
  type of fear would not =
be drawn to the paranormal anyway and in a 
  case of such fear it would al=
ready be present and doing a small 
  protection ritual would not fuel it a=
ny further. So lets take it for 
  what it is, something to utilize in our =
box of tools like an emf 
  meter.you may have an old rusty odd sized wrenc=
h at the bottom of 
  your tool box at home that you inherited from your gr=
andfather and 
  have never usedbut if you come across that odd nut that ne=
eds 
  tightening somedsy you will be glad you have it.Bruce
